name: pascal
text: I just bought a banjo. It is very hard to play. Screw you Ray for just picking it up and playing it. Screw you quite a bit.

name: deancain29
text: good sass.

name: the_doz
text: Chubby from a fellow frustrated banjo player. You are not alone.

name: lucid
text:
Is this straight up banjo, or moving from a similar stringed instrument.
I have a soft spot for banjo pluckin' but I haven't even given enough time to the guitar yet.

name: dj_douche
text: How could you be so petty as to begrudge Ray's blitzin musical talent? A true banjist would salute him; clearly you will never be granted, by the gods of musical karma, a number one banjo-related hit to be spoken of on 60 mInutes.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
If you don't sacrifice the soul of a fried chicken,
You'll never learn banjo finger-pickin.

name: greenkoolayd
text: all he did was pluck 3 strings.  quit bitchin....

name: chasanator
text: a guitjo is a little easier

name: rhetoricperson
text: Funny thing is that if you know a lick of guitar theory you can re-tune the beasts to suit your liking. I have a plectrum (4 string, no short 5th drone string... 'plectrum' denotes that you play it with a pick... these are mostly for rag time and jazz) banjo and I can no some devil blues on it no sweat. If you want to get cute like ray just did without shredding bluegrass all night long... plectrum banjos are the way to go.

name: rhetoricperson
text: *I can rip some devil blues on it*

name: dcofosho224
text: well he did sell his soul to lucifer for nasty piano skilz. I can say from experience that it is way easier to pick up piano if you know how to mess with strings it prolly works vis versa as well. though i never dont recall selling my soul to lucifer at any point along this ride, though ray prolly doesnt remember doing that either cuz as i recall he didnt even read the contract.

name: dcofosho224
text: oh whoa i just went to the next strip i think lucifers involvement in rays musicality may indeed be a factor here.

name: epicurus
text: The last panel doubles my pleasure. Do you think it is possible for a folksy Banjo song about taking it slow to actually be a #1 single in this day and age? I like to imagine that it is.

name: stuart
text: Man Of Constant Sorrow.

name: epicurus
text: Nice

text: Did that seriously get to number #1? Sweet as!

text: what

text: I'm publishing some Reader Notes this Spring.

text: You're forgetting about 90% of modern metal... and about 100% of all the modern music I listen to.

name: tekende
text: Oh no! How could we have forgotten about what soticoto listens to?! HOW! HOW DID WE FORGET. IT IS SO GODDAMN IMPORTANT.

text: OH HOLY FUCK! FUCK! SOMEONE GET THIS GUY'S OPINION RIGHT NOW!

text:
Lowest form of wit, that.
Mariana trench wit, I'd say... as I've been prone to in the past.

name: dtuba
text: Tell it to the pipes, pal.

name: duperando
text: I get it. And also there's the genres of "I'm creative cuz I played it with a sitar instead of a guitar", "I might be having a seizure, or is it music ?", "Stuffing steel wool into your ears would be more soothing than this", etc.

text: purity. of. essence.

text: What? Why did this get lamed?

name: woodenteeth
text: People found it difficult to understand.

name: ted0phile
text:
Or, you know, found it completely facetious.

Or were put off by 'fluid retention', which is an incredibly unsexy way to talk about a sexy thing.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Hey, I'm still confused, Disney Guevara. "Fluid retention"? I guess that's why I date rockers.

name: ted0phile
text: Maybe he's talking about hydrocephalus.

name: daidai
text:
I know this isn't what you meant, but your comment made me imagine a sentence that I find very funny.

"No, bitch. I will not fuck you till we're married. Way too fuckin thirsty."

name: patkun
text: Ray makes things happen. Again.

name: nessotron
text: I always get stuck in Friendship Lane. Always.

name: killerlimpet
text: Ladder Theory's a bitch, ain't it?

name: i_love_kate
text: Elaborate on this... theory.

name: killerlimpet
text:
http://www.laddertheory.com/
http://www.intellectualwhores.com/masterladder.html

it will all make sense...

name: i_love_kate
text: This is a theory of angry, angry men.

name: killerlimpet
text:
irrelevant to its truth value, but yes.

for the record, I know of counterexamples, implying that ladder theory is not all-inclusive, and in spite of it manage to find happiness in love and cuddles.

If you haven't seen Love Actually, see it; even I can't be cynical about it.

name: i_love_kate
text: That film is indeed somewhat pleasing.

name: boredom_man
text:
It is not a theory, and they are not Men.


P.S. Misogyny is still cool.

name: fermatprime
text: They are Devo!

name: scifigrl47
text: I read that, and want to cry.  At least he's not pretending to be impartial, what with the highly scientific classification of 'bitches' being, well, all women.

name: sustainability
text: I tend to think of the hatred of the opposite sex as a normal (though neither healthy nor necessary) part of post-pubescent development in our society -- surely we can hold out hope for killerlimpet and the ladder "theory" guy becoming men later. The fact that young males feel comfortable posting scientific websites about their hatred and young females don't is a different problem, and one which seems less surmountable.

name: spinynorman
text: Ditto.

text: Is that near Blueberry Hill?

text: Naw, it's near Poonless Pointe

text:
And it is usually where you can see me cruising in the car of pain.

sigh

name: sp1derbaby
text: Nah, that's where you find your thrill and ditch the girl. It's in a completely different state where there are no taxes and no enforced age limit on drinking alcohol.

name: paperboy_2000
text: It takes us back to a simpler time when hit songs only had 5 notes.

name: stereo
text:
They ran out of new 5 note patterns and started suing each other, so it had to get more complicated because most musicians are poor.

Ray can pay the license for whatever dang song he "ripped off" so he's probably good to go.

text: Hey, that's also I guess how we talk to aliens.

name: tekende

name: kelissamunz
text: Panel six has to be the best. Ray is shading his eyes as the sun does wane on his relationship with Mabel Jane. His acting out the part is what gives the song meaning and feeling. It is a simple thing.

name: heyoo
text: It is my life's goal to get Andy Rooney recognized as a badass.

name: spinynorman
text: No, Dave, Andy Rooney is Andy Rooney without a sense of humor.

name: cherubrocker22
text: Several days after finding 50 dollars on the sidewalk, Ray accidentally writes the biggest single ever. Can I please know or be someone this lucky?

name: unsentletter
text:
Here's Live 105's actual site for those of you outside the Bay Area = http://www.live105.com .

They suck. The station used to be locally owned, but now it's not, and so now they're indeterminable from any other "alternative" station. Sigh.

text: GodDAMMIT why can Ray pick up a banjo after one minute and write a hit song? That's not right. I've dicked around for a year and written maybe three songs that aren't Cream ripoffs.
